<Heading

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/2.0/files/fileops/move"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Checks if files or folders can be moved or copied to the specified folder, moves or copies them, and returns their information.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"inDto","in":"query","description":"The request parameters for copying/moving files.","schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"folderIds":{"type":"array","items":{"anyOf":[{"type":"integer","example":1234},{"type":"string","example":"some text"}]},"description":"The list of folder IDs to be copied/moved.","nullable":true},"fileIds":{"type":"array","items":{"anyOf":[{"type":"integer","example":1234},{"type":"string","example":"some text"}]},"description":"The list of file IDs to be copied/moved.","nullable":true},"destFolderId":{"oneOf":[{"type":"integer","example":1234},{"type":"string","example":"some text"}],"description":"The destination folder ID."},"conflictResolveType":{"oneOf":[{"enum":["Skip","Overwrite","Duplicate"],"type":"string","description":"[Skip - Skip, Overwrite - Overwrite, Duplicate - Duplicate]","example":"Skip"},{"enum":[0,1,2],"type":"integer","description":"[0 - Skip, 1 - Overwrite, 2 - Duplicate]","example":0,"x-enum-varnames":["Skip","Overwrite","Duplicate"],"x-enum-descriptions":["Skip","Overwrite","Duplicate"]}],"description":"The overwriting behavior of the file copying or moving.","title":"FileConflictResolveType"},"deleteAfter":{"type":"boolean","description":"Specifies whether to delete the source files/folders after they are moved or copied to the destination folder.","example":true},"content":{"type":"boolean","description":"Specifies whether to copy or move the folder content or not.","example":true},"toFillOut":{"type":"boolean","description":"Specifies whether the file is copied for filling out","example":true}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The request parameters for copying/moving files.","title":"BatchRequestDto"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
